title: WTB a T206 Cobb for around $500
author: Luke

posts.post_title: WTB a T206 Cobb for around $500
posts.post_content:
Either bat-off or red portrait.  
Back damage, wrinkles, a few creases, dinged corners, poor centering is all fine by me.  Looking for a clean, colorful image. Don't want a complete beater, and I generally shy away from trimmed cards.  
Shoot me an email at lukealyon@gmail with scans/pics and a price if you have one for sale.  I can do paypal or check/money order.  
The last time I started a thread like this, I was looking for a Walter Johnson Portrait for around $300, with the same aesthetic parameters.  I ended up buying this one for $395, and I couldn't be happier with it.  I'm just including the scans as an example of what I'm looking for.  

Thanks for looking!
Luke
